Function reference

Main Functions

Compute conditional indirect effects, conditional effects, and indirect effects.

cond_indirect() cond_indirect_effects() indirect_effect()
Conditional, Indirect, and Conditional Indirect Effects

Presenting the Effects

index_of_mome()
Generalized Index of Moderated-Mediation
plot(<cond_indirect_effects>)
Plot Conditional Indirect Effect

Moderator Levels

Set the levels of moderators to be used in cond_indirect_effects() and cond_indirect().

mod_levels() mod_levels_list()
Create Levels of Moderators
merge_mod_levels()
Merge the Generated Levels of Moderators

Bootstrapping

Generate bootstrap estimates to be used by the main functions.

do_boot()
Bootstrapping Estimates for 'cond_indirect_effects'
lm2boot_out()
Bootstrapping Estimates for lm Outputs
fit2boot_out() fit2boot_out_do_boot()
Bootstrapping Estimates for a lavaan Output

For ‘lm’

lm2list()
Join 'lm()' Output to Form an 'lm_list-class' Object

For ‘lavaan’

factor2var()
Create Dummy Variables

Methods

Methods for the output of the main functions.

coef(<indirect>)
Indirect effect or conditional indirect effect
confint(<indirect>)
Indirect effect or conditional indirect effect
print(<indirect>)
Print the a 'indirect' Class Object
print(<cond_indirect_effects>)
Print the a 'cond_indirect_effects' Class Object
print(<lm_list>)
Print a lm_list-Class Object
summary(<lm_list>) print(<summary_lm_list>)
Summary of a lm_list-Class Object
coef(<index_of_mome>)
Print the Output of 'index_of_mome'
confint(<index_of_mome>)
Confidence Interval of the Output of 'index_of_mome'
print(<index_of_mome>)
Print the Output of 'index_of_mome'

Datasets

Datasets used in examples.

data_med
Simple Mediation: Sample Dataset
data_med_complicated
A Complicated Mediation Model: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_a
Simple Mediation with a-Path Moderated: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_ab
Simple Mediation with Both Paths Moderated (Two Moderators): Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_ab1
Simple Mediation with Both Paths Moderated By a Moderator: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_b
Simple Mediation with b-Path Moderated: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_b_mod
A Simple Mediation Model with b-Path Moderated-Moderation: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_parallel
Parallel Mediation with Two Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_parallel_cat
Parallel Moderated Mediation with Two Categorical Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_serial
Serial Mediation with Two Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_serial_cat
Serial Moderated Mediation with Two Categorical Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_serial_parallel
Serial-Parallel Mediation with Two Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_med_mod_serial_parallel_cat
Serial-Parallel Moderated Mediation with Two Categorical Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_mod
One Moderator: Sample Dataset
data_mod2
Two Moderators: Sample Dataset
data_mod_cat
Moderation with One Categorical Moderator: Sample Dataset
data_parallel
Parallel Mediation: Sample Dataset
data_serial
Serial Mediation: Sample Dataset
data_serial_parallel
Serial-Parallel Mediation: Sample Dataset
modmed_x1m3w4y1
Sample Dataset: Moderated Serial Mediation
simple_mediation_latent
A Simple Latent Mediation Model

Advanced helpers

Helper functions exported for advanced users.

indirect_i()
Indirect Effect (No Bootstrapping)
check_path()
Check Whether an Indirect Path is Valid in a Model
lm2ptable()
Convert a 'lm' Output to a 'lavaan'-Like Object
lm_from_lavaan_list()
Convert a 'lavaan' Model to an 'lm_from_lavaan_list'-Class Object
coef(<lm_from_lavaan>)
Coefficients of a 'lm_from_lavaan'-Class Object
terms(<lm_from_lavaan>)
Model Terms of a 'lm_from_lavaan'-Class Object
predict(<lm_from_lavaan>)
Predicted Values of a 'lm_from_lavaan'-Class Object
predict(<lm_from_lavaan_list>)
Predicted Values of a 'lm_from_lavaan_list'-Class Object
predict(<lm_list>)
Predicted Values of a 'lm_list'-Class Object
